table.title: Recently scheduled PDF view deliveries
table.searchString: index="_internal" source="*scheduler.log" _ScheduledView__* | head 10000 | rex "_ScheduledView__(?<view_name>\w+)" | fields _time view_name app user status

event.title: Recent PDF activity
event.searchString: index="_internal" (source="*python.log" pdf* OR xvfb OR firefox*) | head 10000
